# scroll-shadow-bar



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property    | Attribute    | Description          | Type               | Default     |
| ----------- | ------------ | -------------------- | ------------------ | ----------- |
| `position`  | `position`   | 所在位置                 | `"right" \| "top"` | `'top'`     |
| `scrollDom` | --           | 监控滚动条的element节点      | `HTMLDivElement`   | `undefined` |
| `scrollNum` | `scroll-num` | 滚动条距离开始距离，当为0时隐藏滚动阴影 | `number`           | `0`         |
| `zIndex`    | `z-index`    | 显示的z-index层级         | `number`           | `undefined` |
